snippet: With a 3-2 win Sunday over Milwaukee, St. Louis pulled within one game of the Brewers’ division lead.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; pitcher John Lackey wins his debut for St Louis Cardinals in 3-2 victory over Milwaukee Brewers; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: With a 3-2 win Sunday over Milwaukee, St. Louis pulled within one game of the Brewers’ division lead.

headline.main: Lackey Wins in His Debut for St. Louis
headline.print_headline: Lackey Wins in His Debut for St. Louis
